name: Stupid cube
description:
Story

This is a short mini-story about the little red cube, who want to find answers to all his questions. He must to get to the Big Red Cube, but it is not too easy! You need to collect little cubes or TheBigRedCube will not answer you! 

ControlsAndroid: tap and smash the screenPC: W, A, S, D and LMBCreated by:Daniil OschepkovTwitter @DOshepkoveSpeakerFish Studio
